E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Hideo Nomo
Dear Sir,
Hideo Nomo has nothing more to prove at A Fort Lauderdale Yankees!
He has an ERA of 1.32 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Javier Ortiz
Dear Sir,
Javier Ortiz isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Albany-Colonie Yankees!
He has an AVG of .211, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Donovan Osborne
Dear Sir,
Donovan Osborne has an ERA of 3.92 at A Fort Lauderdale Yankees!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Doug Johns
Dear Sir,
Doug Johns has nothing more to prove at A Fort Lauderdale Yankees!
He has an ERA of 3.52 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 5/4/1990
Subject: Playing time
Manager,
I am not very happy about my playing time recently.
I think I deserve a starting spot!

Regards,
Ivan Calderon



Date: Wednesday, 5/7/1990
Subject: Status of Urbano Lugo
Dear Sir,
Urbano Lugo has an ERA of 5.08 at AA Albany-Colonie Yankees.
I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/12/1990
Subject: Progress of Kelly Stinnett
Dear Sir,
Kelly Stinnett is hitting the ball well at AA Albany-Colonie Yankees!
He has an AVG of .301, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/19/1990
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Rafael Palmeiro



Date: Saturday, 5/24/1990
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Mike Witt



Date: Monday, 5/26/1990
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Gary Ward
